info.name: centrica test
info.description:
Test cases for centrica.
1) two web services
2) two web service communication on http
3) two web service communication in pub/sub topology.

request.description: Service for greetings. This will generate "Hello World" response.
Service for greeting. This will generate "Hello Management" output.
One service calling another service, using http protocol.
One service calling to another using RabbitMQ
